prompt:
You must adhere to the the following constraints <CONSTRAINTS START> Robot's Rules: I am a wheeled robot. I cannot drive on slippery, wet surfaces.<CONSTRAINTS END> 
Point to all objects you can interface with.in the given image <1>. Assign very short descriptive natural language labels to objects in output. The answer should follow the json format: [{"point": <point>, "label": <label1>}, ...]. The points are in [y, x] format normalized to 0-1000. Any rationale or explanation can be prepended to the json output
response_text:
[ANSWER]
Looking closely at the image, I can see a paved path that splits into two directions, with a large puddle in the foreground. There are two small structures (possibly shelters or kiosks) at the end of each path. The puddle is on a wet surface, which would be slippery.

Given the robot's constraint (cannot drive on slippery, wet surfaces), the only object I can interface with is the dry pavement surrounding the puddle. The structures appear to be fixed and not something the robot could interact with meaningfully.

I need to identify the exact points on the dry pavement areas.


[TOOL_CALL] image_zoom_in_tool
{"label": "dry pavement area on the left side of the puddle", "bbox_2d": [0, 500, 300, 1000], "img_idx": 0}
[TOOL_CALL] image_zoom_in_tool
{"label": "dry pavement area on the right side of the puddle", "bbox_2d": [600, 500, 1000, 1000], "img_idx": 0}
